description: A high-performance laptop with a 15-inch 4K display, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and a powerful new-gen processor. Great for professionals and creatives.
An extremely lightweight and portable laptop with a 13-inch screen and up to 20 hours of battery life. Perfect for frequent travelers.
A top-tier gaming laptop with a high-refresh-rate screen, dedicated graphics card, and advanced cooling system.
A flagship smartphone with a stunning OLED display, professional-grade camera system, and all-day battery life.
An affordable smartphone that covers all the essentials, with a large screen, decent camera, and long-lasting battery.
